changelog:
TruckersMP-FAAv2 | 1.0.5
Change Log:
[Main]
Added global exception handling, even if the cheat is outdated, or made incorrectly, your game should never crash
Improved general code w/ bug fixes
Removed console for non debug builds, you can find the log in: \bin\win_x64\TMPFAA.log

[Spectate]
Added Fling button, USE WITH TRAILER DETATCHED!

[Truck]
Added Spin feature
Added RGB Headlights
Added RGB Interior Buttons
Added Config

[Physics]
Added teker mode
Added cabin gravity
Added chassis gravity
Added trailer gravity
Removed Extra Grip in favour for gravity
Weakened Super Brakes so they are actually useable (still provides very good brake intensity)
Added Config

[Camera]
Added Config

Configs are stored in: \Documents\TruckersMP-FAA\configs
You can share your own in: ‚Å†configs
